title: 精英怪物MOD怪物掉落物修改后不能使用
author: 一恶遮百善
txt_content:
InfernalMobs精英怪物mod，1.12.2版本。修改了怪物掉落后绿宝石和钻石之类的矿物无法使用，建模丢失，都是一片紫色。
S:droppedItemIDsElite=minecraft:iron_block-1-3,minecraft:gold_block-1-3,minecraft:diamond_block-1-3,minecraft:emerald_block-1-3,minecraft:ghast_tear-1-3,minecraft:blaze_rod-1-3,minecraft:ender_pearl-1-3,minecraft:golden_apple-1-3,minecraft:cooked_mutton-1-9
    S:droppedItemIDsInfernal=minecraft:iron_block-2-6,minecraft:gold_block-2-6,minecraft:diamond_block-2-6,minecraft:emerald_block-2-6,minecraft:ghast_tear-2-6,minecraft:blaze_rod-2-6,minecraft:minecraft:ender_pearl-2-6,minecraft:golden_apple-2-6,minecraft:cooked_mutton-2-18
    S:droppedItemIDsUltra=minecraft:nether_star-1-3,minecraft:iron_block,minecraft:gold_block-1-3,minecraft:diamond_block_block-1-3,minecraft:emerald_block-1-3,minecraft:redstone_block-1-3,minecraft:golden_apple-3-9,minecraft:cooked_porkchop-3-36


这是我改的掉落，不知道为啥不行，有大佬帮忙看下吗？
